local_intent: Perform a controlled push of the T-block (0.1 m at 135 deg) after ensuring visibility, correct yaw (90 deg), and alignment; verify visibility after the stroke.
assumptions: Target t_block is detectable via spiral scan if initially not visible
Yaw 90 degrees is the desired pushing orientation for this stroke
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT push phase: perceive t_block, ensure yaw=90, align, execute the Push (with retry to handle slip), and verify visibility before proceeding.
